title: Are we over-medicalized?
description: Reuters health editor Ivan Oransky warns that we're suffering from an epidemic of preposterous preconditions -- pre-diabetes, pre-cancer, and many more. In this engaging talk from TEDMED he shows how health care can find a solution... by taking an important lesson from baseball.
author: Ivan Oransky
keywords: TED, talks, cancer, health, health care, medicine, science, activism, aging, disease, bioethics, society, culture, sports, public health
